snippet: Mónica Spear, a soap opera actress and former Miss Venezuela, and her ex-husband were killed by robbers after their car broke down, the authorities said.
abstract: Monica Spear, soap opera actress and former Miss Venezuela, is shot to death by robbers after her car breaks down on highway; her ex-husband is also killed, and their 5-year-old daughter is wounded.
lead_paragraph: Mónica Spear, a soap opera actress and former Miss Venezuela, and her ex-husband were killed by robbers after their car broke down, the authorities said.

headline.main: Venezuela: Death of Beauty Queen in Robbery Rattles Country
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Death of Beauty Queen in Robbery Rattles Country
